articles.title: Lakers: Columnist Thinks LA Might Have to Make Russell Westbrook-John Wall Trade

articles.content: While the NBA's best are battling it out in the first round of the playoffs, the Lakers are staring down a daunting to-do list. First, they have to hire a new coach. Then, the front office, led by general manager Rob Pelinka and senior basketball adv... [1688 chars]

articles.title: Anything You Can Do, Pascal Siakam Can Do Better
articles.description: The Toronto Raptors forward has the size to go toe-to-toe with NBA big men and the skill to function as a wing or a point guard. And even after developing from a curiosity to a championship role player to an All-NBA player in the span of six seasons, Siakam isn’t done exploring the limits of his versatility.
articles.content: There are teams that earn their way to the playoffs through their commitment to a hard-and-fast system, thriving in the security it provides. And then there’s the Raptors’ amoebic collection of problem solvers, who spend their 48 minutes figuring out... [12854 chars]
